data.text: Yahweh controls what kings do [MTY] like he controls how streams flow;
People always think that what they do is right,
Doing what is right and fair is more acceptable to Yahweh
Being proud and arrogant [DOU] is like a lamp [MTY] that guides wicked people;
People who plan carefully will surely have plenty of what they need;
Money that people acquire by cheating others by lying [MTY] to them will soon disappear like a mist,
Wicked people refuse to do what is right/just,
Guilty people continually do what is evil; it is as though [MET] they are walking on a crooked road;
It is better to live in the corner of an attic/housetop by yourself
Wicked people [SYN] are always wanting to do what is evil;
When those who ridicule others are punished, even those who do not have good sense see that, and they become wise,
God, the one who is completely righteous, knows what happens inside the houses of wicked people,
There are people who refuse to listen when poor people cry out for help;
When someone is angry with you,
Good/Righteous people are happy when they see others do what is just/fair,
Those who stop behaving like those who have good sense behave
Those who spend their money to buy ◄things that give them pleasure/things that cause them to feel happy► will become poor;
Wicked people bring on themselves the sufferings
It is better to live alone in a desert
Wise people have many valuable things in their houses,
Those who always try to act in a fair and kind way toward others
A wise army commander helps his troops climb over a wall to attack a city that is defended by a strong army,
Those who are very careful about what they say [MTY]
Those who make fun of everything that is good are proud and conceited [DOU];
Lazy people, who refuse to work, will die of hunger
All during the day wicked people desire to obtain things,
Yahweh detests the sacrifices that wicked people offer to him;
Those who tell lies in court will be punished;
Wicked people pretend that they know everything,
Thinking that we are wise, and that we understand many things, and that we have good insight,
We can get horses ready to fight in a battle,
